title: Node1
body:
date: Oh, sorry I'm late!
date: I would have texted you, but I ran out of credit.
date: Hey Chris, how are you? How did you find Friday's test?
player: It was Okay.
-> I found the maths hard
    player: There were so many numbers. 
    player: Every day I see a number I've never seen before.
    <<set $somanynumbers to true>>
-> I think I did alright.
    player: I'm not sure.

player: How did you find it?
mono: She was late; she can't care about this that much.
mono: She was out of phone credit?
date: I find the formulas quite tough.
mono: Who uses phone credit?
<<if $somanynumbers is true>>
date: You're right though, there are so many numbers!
date: I saw 10.0129 yesterday, I didn't even know there was a 10.0128!
<<endif>>
[[Node2]]

title: Node2
body:
date: This place seems nice, have you been here before?
player: It's my first time!
player: I've heard good things about it.
date: What are you thinking of getting?
date: I feel like fish and chips, but there's a lot that looks good.
-> I'm thinking tacos.
    player: I'm lookin to nosh some tacos, dude
    date: Tacos are my favourite of the crescent-shaped foods!
-> The burger looks alright.
    player: I hear the burgers got good reviews.
    date: One of my favourite video games is about burgers. You should play it!
    player: Oh really, that sounds interesting!
    date: It's actually the best game ever made, probably, of all time. Like, topsies.
    player: Wow!
    date: I could talk about it forever! 
    mono: This game sounds really interesting!
    player: On second thought let's just get tacos.
-> I agree, fish and chips all way.
    player: I'm so into fish and chips.
    date: Great minds! Great minds!
player: I'm glad we had the chance to catch up today!
mono: Maybe she DID run out of credit.
player: I've been really looking forward to it.
player: It's great to catch up
mono: Wait did I already say it was nice to see her?
player: It's just, you know, really cool.
mono: I shouldn't have assumed she would be intentionally late. I'm an asshole.
mono: Crap! I think I'm leading this conversation too much.

[[Where do you work?|Work]]
[[What kind of movies are you into?|Movies]]

title: Movies
body:
player: What movies have you seen recently?
date: I really like Sci-fi. I saw The Martian five times already!
player: I haven't seen it yet. I'd love to go see it some time.
date: Hey, yeah, that's a good idea! We should do that together.
mono: Oh, she wants to go see a movie?
mono: Would it be a date?
mono: It was phrased like it could be a catch up, not a date...
mono: Wait, does that mean she just wants to be friends?
player: for a catch up?
date: Yeah, sure!
-> Sounds cool
    player: I'm in! We can sort out the deets later on if you'd like.
    date: Great!
-> Uh, I'll think about it
    player: I'll um, check my calendar.
    date: Oh, no problem, you're probably pretty busy, right?
    player: Yeah, a little. Thanks for the offer, though.
    mono: Darn it, I would have been way into seeing Martian!
player: Sorry if I seem a little on edge. I'm having a good time.




<<addanxiety 10>>
-> mono: I’ve thought this way before, this is what I do when I’m anxious.
    <<addanxiety -10>>
-> I’m sorry I was stupid.
    date: Oh don’t say that, it’s fine.
    <<set $apologised to true>>
    <<addanxiety 10>>

<<if $apologised is true>>

<<endif>>
